memory
Class MemoryBoard

java.lang.Object
  memory.MemoryBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEnvironment, IEnvironmentTwoPlayers, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MemoryBoardZP
public class MemoryBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEnvironmentTwoPlayers

This version of the Memory game tries to maximize the probability to win the game. It is different than the version studied by Zwick & Patterson, where they try to maximize the number of cards.

Author:
Francesco De Comite
See Also:
MemoryBoardZP, Serialized Form

whoWins

public int whoWins(IState s)
Description copied from interface: IEnvironment
Who won ?
  • Two-players game :
    • Player One : -1
    • Tie : 0
    • Player Two : 1
  • Single-player game :
    • Win : -1
    • Null: 0
    • Loose: 1

Specified by:
whoWins in interface IEnvironment
